amendment.description: An amendment numbered 395 printed in Part A of House Report 117-405 to incentivize states to enact, at a minimum, the rights afforded to victims in the Survivors Bill of Rights Act.
amendment.purpose: Amendment incentivizes states to enact, at a minimum, the rights afforded to victims in the Survivors Bill of Rights Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A031) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 195 (Roll no. 338).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A031) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A031) offered by Ms. Speier.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Speier amendment (A031) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 222 - 195 (Roll no. 338).
